4151.verse: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ|And warn them|120|135|11193$يَوْمَ|(of the) Day|102|133|1057$ٱلْأَزِفَةِ|the Approaching,|133|164|15108$إِذِ|when|55|86|5836$ٱلْقُلُوبُ|the hearts|89|120|9451$لَدَى|(are) at|72|87|15109$ٱلْحَنَاجِرِ|the throats,|100|109|15110$كَـٰظِمِينَۚ|choked.|97|115|15111$مَا|Not|43|61|262$لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|for the wrongdoers|146|164|2438$مِنْ|any|50|68|53$حَمِيمٍ|intimate friend|115|133|5713$وَلَا|and no|65|74|25$شَفِيعٍ|intercessor|93|318|13869$يُطَاعُ|(who) is obeyed.|132|357|15112$

4152.verse: يَعْلَمُ|He knows|83|105|742$خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ|(the) stealthy glance|161|205|15113$وَمَا|and what|82|126|46$تُخْفِى|conceal|72|116|3204$ٱلصُّدُورُ|the breasts.|102|124|15114$

4153.verse: وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|88|167$يَقْضِى|judges|82|95|8316$بِٱلْحَقِّۖ|in truth,|78|91|692$وَٱلَّذِينَ|while those (whom)|150|163|42$يَدْعُونَ|they invoke|97|110|1942$مِن دُونِهِۦ|besides Him|116|129|4463$لَا|not|42|49|30$يَقْضُونَ|they judge|94|113|15115$بِشَىْءٍۗ|with anything.|115|153|1363$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|108|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah -|63|101|184$هُوَ|He|48|86|298$ٱلسَّمِيعُ|(is) the All-Hearer,|144|163|1170$ٱلْبَصِيرُ|the All-Seer.|104|104|10212$

4154.verse: ۞ أَوَلَمْ|Do not|103|109|2346$يَسِيرُواْ|they travel|93|105|9303$فِى|in|48|60|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|104|100$فَيَنظُرُواْ|and see|101|113|9304$كَيْفَ|how|66|78|288$كَانَ|was|57|69|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|89|3299$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|130|20$كَانُواْ|were|69|91|94$مِن قَبْلِهِمْۚ|before them?|107|129|1094$كَانُواْ|They were|90|112|94$هُمْ|[they]|62|84|49$أَشَدَّ|superior|72|94|1780$مِنْهُمْ|to them|72|83|730$قُوَّةً|(in) strength|104|125|7723$وَءَاثَارًا|and (in) impressions|152|194|15116$فِى|in|48|90|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land,|92|134|100$فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ|but Allah seized them|162|183|2651$بِذُنُوبِهِمْ|for their sins,|108|116|2652$وَمَا|and not|71|86|46$كَانَ|was|57|72|913$لَهُم|for them|76|91|98$مِّنَ|against|68|83|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|68|606$مِن|any|50|65|53$وَاقٍ|protector.|87|94|9482$

4155.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|72|28$بِأَنَّهُمْ|(was) because [they]|165|182|607$كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ|used to come to them|167|184|15117$رُسُلُهُم|their Messengers|132|148|6645$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs|131|139|880$فَكَفَرُواْ|but they disbelieved,|159|175|14744$فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ|So Allah seized them.|162|194|2651$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|124|396$قَوِىٌّ|(is) All-Strong,|118|150|7318$شَدِيدُ|severe|67|83|1445$ٱلْعِقَابِ|(in) punishment.|128|128|1746$

4158.verse: فَلَمَّا|Then when|93|103|141$جَآءَهُم|he brought to them|149|170|853$بِٱلْحَقِّ|the truth|80|101|692$مِنْ|from|50|71|53$عِندِنَا|Us,|71|92|10900$قَالُواْ|they said,|86|107|101$ٱقْتُلُوٓاْ|`Kill|72|82|4150$أَبْنَآءَ|(the) sons|89|102|15118$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|145|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|108|84$مَعَهُۥ|with him,|80|106|1875$وَٱسْتَحْيُواْ|and let live|112|138|15119$نِسَآءَهُمْۚ|their women.`|114|127|6724$وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$كَيْدُ|(is the) plot|99|136|11511$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|(of) the disbelievers|153|190|364$إِلَّا|but|42|79|86$فِى|in|48|85|89$ضَلَـٰلٍ|error.|77|95|3468$

4150.verse: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.

4151.verse: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled [with distress]. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.

4152.verse: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.

4153.verse: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

4154.verse: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector.

4155.verse: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.

4156.verse: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority

4157.verse: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."

4158.verse: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error.
